name: Knightmare (itch) (zervent)
description:
Knightmare, is a 2D platform game where you try to escape a dungeon that represents life.  

In this dungeon, the monsters that the player runs from represent the bad elements/aspects you face in life like anxiety, fear, stress, deadlines etc.

The blue orbs you have to collect through the dungeon in order to escape represents good elements in life like hope, happiness, friends etc.
